mapper.select: select * from( select fundno, fundname, proposal, homepage, cursum, goalsum, participant, startdate, duedate, content, hits, ceil(rownum/5) as page from (select fund_no fundno, fund_name fundname, proposal, homepage, cur_sum cursum, goal_sum goalsum, participant, start_date startdate, due_date duedate, content, hits from gibu_fund order by fund_no desc))where page=#{value}

select fund_no fundno, fund_name fundname, proposal, homepage, cur_sum cursum, goal_sum goalsum, participant, start_date startdate, due_date duedate, content, hits from gibu_fund where fund_no=#{value}
mapper.insert:
select gibu_fund_seq.nextval from dual
insert into gibu_fund (fund_no,fund_name,proposal,homepage,goal_sum,start_date,due_date,content) values(#{fundNo},#{fundName},#{proposal}, #{homepage},#{goalSum},#{startDate},#{dueDate},#{content})
mapper.update: update gibu_fund set hits=hits+1 where fund_no=#{value}
update gibu_fund set cur_sum=cur_sum+#{curSum} where fund_no=#{fundNo}
